text:
Hello,

I am trying to upload a file to my client application. While recording, the file uploads without any issues. While playback, an error pops up saying File is unable to upload. the file is located in my local \bin folder.


There are 3 steps to upload:

1)Click Upload... this will open up a new window... this Step PASSED
2)In the new window, click Browse button to browse for the file .... this Step also PASSED.
3)Click Upload and Save.. this Step FAILED

Questions:

1)Do I have to change the parameter and MIME type?
2)Do i have to set any value in Event Target?


Thanks and would really appreciate your help.
